title: Hippie, Inc.
description: Hippie, Inc. tells the story of the original hippie community, which conceived or popularized innovative ideas and products that over the course of the next five decades, created employment for millions ofAmericans, pumped billions of dollars into the nation s economy, transformedU.S. consumer culture and business practices, and shaped the most commercially lucrative social movement in American history."
author: Michael Klassen
